# Sample MCP Rollout Checklist

**Project:** checklist-manager-mcp
**Created:** 2025-11-01
**Status:** In Progress

## Pre-Development
- [x] Requirements defined in SPECIFICATION.md
- [x] Architecture documented
- [ ] Dependencies identified *(depends: Requirements defined)*

## Development
- [x] Phase 1 complete (basic CRUD tools)
- [ ] Phase 2 complete (advanced tools) *(depends: Phase 1 complete)*
- [ ] Code review completed *(depends: Phase 2 complete, mandatory)*

## Testing
- [ ] Unit tests written (80%+ coverage) *(depends: Phase 2 complete, mandatory)*
- [ ] Integration tests pass *(depends: Unit tests written)*
- [ ] Smoke tests pass *(depends: Integration tests pass)*

## Documentation
- [ ] API docs updated *(mandatory)*
- [ ] README updated
- [ ] Template library created

## Pre-Rollout
- [ ] Quality gates verified *(depends: Testing complete, mandatory)*
- [ ] Configuration validated *(mandatory)*
- [ ] Deployment plan ready

## Deployment
- [ ] Build successful *(depends: Quality gates verified)*
- [ ] Deployed to user scope *(depends: Build successful)*
- [ ] Smoke tests in production *(depends: Deployed to user scope, mandatory)*

## Completion
- [ ] Checklist archived
- [ ] Lessons learned documented

**Last Updated:** 2025-11-01
**Progress:** 4/21 items complete (19%)
